actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Railroad Retirement Act of 1937 to provide that actual entitlement to a social security benefit shall not have the effect of reducing an individual's railroad retirement annuity by depriving such individual of the full advantage of the so-called social security guarantee formula in the computation of his or her annuity.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Provides that actual entitlement to a social security benefit shall not have the effect of reducing an individual's railroad retirement annuity by depriving such individual of the full advantage of the social security guarantee formula in the computation of his or her annuity.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Railroad Retirement Act of 1937 to provide that actual entitlement to a social security benefit shall not have the effect of reducing an individual's railroad retirement annuity by depriving such individual of the full advantage of the so-called social security guarantee formula in the computation of his or her annuity.
